headline: /businessindustryandtrade/businessactivitysizeandlocation/timeseries/raid1
lede: UK Business: Activity, Size and Location is an annual publication produced from an extract taken from the Inter-Departmental Business Register (IDBR). This publication, which is a ‘snapshot’ of the IDBR, shows the position of units that have registered for Value Added Tax (VAT) and/or Pay as You Earn (PAYE) as of March of the reference year. It is generally released six months after the reference year period, that is, September or October.
name: Business Activity, Size and Location
